Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: multi-provider AI brief, dashboard fixes, Admin page renumber

- Weekly Brief: add provider selector \(gemini/claude/chatgpt\), web
  coherence check toggle, and model override input
- briefing.py: route synthesize_weekly_brief_llm by provider with
  web_check and model_override params
- model_router.py: add Google Search tool support in _call_gemini_text
  via use_google_search param
- Dashboard: fix exclude_from_brief crash when column missing, apply
  _safe_list consistently in topic filter and heatmap, add date range
  labels to Topic Momentum chart
- Home.py: add Documents page to navigation caption
- Rename Admin page from 06 to 08 to accommodate new page ordering

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
